You will be able to work smarter with cloud-based documents using OneDrive and SharePoint, and understand when to use what.

items.title: The Easiest Beginners Guide to Microsoft Excel
items.headline: If you've struggled with Excel or you don't know much about it, I've created this course just for you.

items.title: Excel with Interactive Excel Dashboards
items.headline: Learn how to create amazing interactive Excel Dashboards that will wow your boss & take your career to the next level. Lifetime access with no subscription on Udemy.
objectives_summary: I teach you the 5 key questions to ask in the planning stage of your report so you get it right first time.
Learn how to choose the right chart for your data; I teach you over 20 charts and show you which type of chart will best display your data.

Learn how to write reports that are easy to read and interpret; plus I share with you a heat map of your page that shows you where your most important data should go and where will get the least attention.
